questions.quote: It's a one-time fee. A hundred and fifty bucks. Why live like this?!
It was very traumatic. The last thing I remember is you flinching. Then, everything went black.
Well, you know... the friend meeting the new woman. I feel like I'm getting fixed up for a friendship.
Ah hah. Well, listen. You would be wise to keep your distance from him.
He knows how to read. And he also knows finishing an entire book doesn't prove anything. And get this: he's into architecture.
Now I don't believe this. That guy owes me big time. I got him off sugar! Look, I'm gonna go down there with you right now.
Alright, you know I'm supposed to go on this special tour today with George's girlfriend.
Well, I'm no genius but, according to my calculations he should be here in a few seconds.
I know. So why do we need two people in the show that can't act?
No, trust me, that one was doing more harm than good. Don't forget to use the Plax too.
